original_text: So Gehazi ran quickly after Naaman before he had gone very far. Naaman saw that a man was running after him. So he got down from his chariot to meet him. Naaman asked Gehazi, ‘Is everything well?’
korean_text: 나아만의 뒤를 쫓아가니 나아만이 자기 뒤에 달려옴을 보고 수레에서 내려 맞이하여 이르되 평안이냐 하니

sentences.original_text: So Gehazi ran quickly after Naaman
before he had gone very far
Naaman saw that a man was running after him
sentences.korean_translation: 나아만은 한 사람이 자기를 뒤쫓아오는 것을 보았습니다

sentences.original_text: So he got down from his chariot
